p: Three studies, one on DENV and ZIKV [ 161] and two on DENV and CHIKV [ 167, 167], were conducted in French Polynesia, a territory already hyper-endemic for DENV. The first study was conducted in 2013, immediately before the emergence of ZIKV, whereas the two additional studies were conducted after the emergence of ZIKV and CHIKV in 2014.
